Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Represents a header or footer that is associated with a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter provides header and footer information for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner> when it is displayed in print preview mode. If provided by the workflow designer, users can configure headers and footers on the **Header/Footer** tab on the **Page Setup** dialog box.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner parent, bool isHeader) cil managed

Docs.param: to indicate that the is a header; to indicate that the is a footer.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the root designer to which the header or footer is applied.
Docs.value: The to which the is applied.

Docs.summary: Gets the bounding rectangle of the header or footer on the workflow design surface.
Docs.value: The that bounds the on the workflow design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Drawing.Image Image { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the image associated with the header or footer.
Gets the bounding rectangle for the image associated with the header or footer.
Docs.value: The that defines the bounds for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Image%2A> associated with the .

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to override the ImageRectangle property. In this example, the ImageRectangle is calculated using the Bounds of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> to draw the image in the upper left corner of the header/footer.
[!code-cs[WF_Samples#74](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/wf_snippets/snippets.cs#74)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#74](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/wf_snippets/snippets.vb#74)]

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to override the TextRectangle property. In this example, the TextRectangle is calculated using the Bounds of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> as well as the location and size of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A>.
[!code-cs[WF_Samples#75](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/wf_snippets/snippets.cs#75)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#75](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/wf_snippets/snippets.vb#75)]
